QSC18 VIRTUAL EDITION: Keynote Announced

We are excited to announce the Keynote session for our first Virtual Edition of Qualys Security Conference (QSC).

As companies embrace technologies such as the Internet of Things, big data, cloud, and mobility, they must make security more than an afterthought.

Securing the Hybrid IT Environment with a Cloud-Oriented Architecture and Enabling Digital Transformation

Qualys Chairman and CEO Philippe Courtot will discuss how in this digital era, the focus needs to shift from securing network perimeters to safeguarding data spread across systems, endpoints, and the cloud.

QSC18 Virtual Edition also offers:

Thought leadership on how to regain visibility across hybrid IT environments
Best practices on consolidating your security and compliance stack to make it more effective and less costly
Case studies from leading enterprises on safeguarding their digital transformation by building security in and not bolting it on
Roadmap updates and use cases from the Enterprise TruRisk Platform product teams

We look forward to e-meet you!
